title: Definition of Technical Experience
text: Technical experience refers to the practical knowledge gained through directly engaging with technology tools, systems, and software. Consider which roles usually require deep understanding and skills in areas such as programming, data analysis, and machine learning.

title: Definition of Working Experience
text: Working experience is the duration and depth of knowledge one gains while fulfilling professional roles. It includes understanding industry-specific practices and processes acquired over time.

title: Explain the Role of a Data Scientist
text: A Data Scientist is someone who uses scientific methods, algorithms, and systems to extract insights and knowledge from structured and unstructured data. Their work involves statistical analyses, machine learning, and predictive modeling.

title: Explain the Role of a Data Engineer
text: Data Engineers focus on the design, development, construction, installation, testing, and maintenance of databases and data systems. They ensure that data is readily available for use by Data Scientists and Analysts.

title: Explain the Role of a Data Analyst
text: Data Analysts are professionals who interpret data and turn it into information that can offer ways to improve business, thus affecting business decisions. They analyze large datasets by developing and implementing data analyses, data collection systems, and other strategies that optimize statistical efficiency and quality.
